description:
My place is located close to Central Park in Manhattan. Just three blocks to convenient 6 train which will take you to heart of Manhattan in just couple minutes. Very convenient neighborhood with plenty of supermarkets, coffee shop, restaurants and laundromat next to our building.  My place is good for couples and solo adventurers. 
It's one bedroom apartment with two queens size beds.Feel free to ask any question.

Its a large one bedroom apartment with two double beds. Sunny living room with open kitchen.

I would love to meet you upon arrival and leave my place all for you to make you feel like home :)

6 train just two blocks away.

I don't have reviews because before my husband would take care of this apartment before but since he is very busy I created my account.
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/12171089?preview 
thats his profile and reviews.
name: 1 Bedroom Apt close to Central Park
review:
Overall we had a pleasant stay, the hostess is very nice and helpful. The place is bigger than the pictures show and very comfortable. Close to metro, target and 7/11, but not really walking distance to the inner city.
The only negative is that it was a bit noisy at night, as the apartment is right above a restaurant, it wasn't that big a deal for us, as three 20 y/o's, but maybe if you're travelling with small children it could be slight problem. 
Even so, we would definitely recommend it!
